      • findAnnotationWithStereoType

        public static Optional<Annotation> findAnnotationWithStereoType(Class type,
                                                                Class stereotype)
        Finds an annotation on the given class for the given stereotype. The result of this method is cached. This method should not be used in runtime code that is executed repeatedly. Consumers of this method should be aware that code that utilizes the method should be executed once upon startup.
        Parameters:
        type - The type
        stereotype - The stereotype
        Returns:
        The annotation

      • findAnnotation

        public static <T extends Annotation> Optional<T> findAnnotation(Method method,
                                                                @Nullable
                                                                Class<T> annotationType)
        Finds an annotation on the given method for the given type. The result of this method is cached. This method should not be used in runtime code that is executed repeatedly. Consumers of this method should be aware that code that utilizes the method should be executed once upon startup.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The annotation generic type
        Parameters:
        method - The method
        annotationType - The type
        Returns:
        The annotation

      • findAnnotation

        public static <T extends Annotation> Optional<T> findAnnotation(@Nullable
                                                                Class type,
                                                                @Nullable
                                                                Class<T> annotationType)
        Finds an annotation on the given class for the given type. The result of this method is cached. This method should not be used in runtime code that is executed repeatedly. Consumers of this method should be aware that code that utilizes the method should be executed once upon startup.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The annotation generic type
        Parameters:
        type - The type to search
        annotationType - The annotation type
        Returns:
        The annotation

                                                                @Nullable
                                                                Class<T> type)
        Finds an annotation on the given class for the given element. The result of this method is cached. This method should not be used in runtime code that is executed repeatedly. Consumers of this method should be aware that code that utilizes the method should be executed once upon startup.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The annotation generic type
        Parameters:
        element - The element
        type - The the annotation type
        Returns:
        The annotation

        Parameters:

        type - The the annotation type
